12. The undertaking shall indicate whether and how its policies address the following matters
where material:
(a) water management including:
i. the use and sourcing of water and marine resources in its own
operations; ii. water treatment as a step towards more sustainable sourcing of
water; and iii. the prevention and abatement of water pollution resulting from
its activities.
